countries.name: Australia
countries.description: A vast country known for its diverse landscapes, from the Outback to beautiful coastlines, vibrant cities, and unique wildlife including kangaroos and koalas.

countries.name: Japan
countries.description: Land of the rising sun, featuring ancient traditions, modern technology, beautiful cherry blossoms, and exquisite cuisine. Experience the perfect blend of old and new.

beaches.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
beaches.description: A tropical paradise with crystal-clear turquoise waters, overwater bungalows, and pristine white sand beaches. Perfect for romance and relaxation.

beaches.name: Santorini, Greece
beaches.description: Famous for its stunning sunsets, white-washed buildings, and dramatic cliffs overlooking the Aegean Sea. A photographer's dream destination.

beaches.name: Maldives
beaches.description: An archipelago of coral islands with pristine beaches, luxury resorts, and world-class diving and snorkeling in crystal-clear waters.

beaches.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
beaches.description: One of the world's most famous beaches, known for its vibrant atmosphere, beach volleyball, and stunning views of Sugarloaf Mountain.

name: Brazil
description: Home to the Amazon rainforest, vibrant carnival culture, stunning beaches, and the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue. A country of natural wonders and cultural richness.

name: Italy
description: A European gem known for its rich history, Renaissance art, delicious cuisine, and romantic cities like Rome, Venice, and Florence.

temples.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temples.description: The largest religious monument in the world, this ancient temple complex showcases the grandeur of the Khmer Empire and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

temples.name: Kyoto Temples, Japan
temples.description: Ancient Buddhist and Shinto temples set in serene gardens, representing centuries of Japanese spiritual tradition and architectural excellence.

temples.name: Bagan Temples, Myanmar
temples.description: Over 2,000 ancient Buddhist temples and pagodas scattered across a mystical plain, offering breathtaking sunrise views and spiritual experiences.

temples.name: Borobudur, Indonesia
temples.description: A magnificent 9th-century Mahayana Buddhist temple with intricate stone carvings and stupas, set against the backdrop of lush Javanese landscape.
